name: Attack
note:
Disable Name
<BECThrowable>
<throw object: before>
image: picture 'Shuriken'
speed: 120
arc: 50
spin: 12
start: -16, -4
</throw object>

<throw object: during>
image: picture 'Shuriken'
speed: 120
arc: -50
spin: 12
end: -16, -4
return
</throw object>
<target action>
</target action>

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

name: 2x-Cut
note:
<setup action>
action animation 122: user
wait: 100
</setup action>

<target action>
camera screen: targets, back center, 420
zoom: 120%, 40
move user: target, front base, 5
face user: forward
motion swing: user
motion wait: user

motion swing: user
action animation: target
wait for animation
shake screen: 7, 6, 35
action effect
wait: 40

wait for movement
</target action>
<follow action>
reset camera: 10
</follow action>

note:

description: Attack coomes from in front of Aps
name: Sewer Attack
Braver
note:
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>
<target action>
perform start
float user: 40%, 60
zoom: 150%, 20
camera screen: user, front center, 20
camera focus: user, front center, 20
motion attack: user
Eval: user.battler().setMaxFrame(0)
animation 140: user
animation wait 140: user
wait for float
move user: targets, front, 20
float user: 0, 0
wait for float
motion attack: user
Eval: user.battler().setMaxFrame(4)
wait for movement
animation 141: target
animation wait 141: target
action effect
wait: 15
</target action>
<finish action>
immortal: target, false
move user: home
Eval: user.battler().setMaxFrame(4)
clear battle log
perform finish
</finish action>

Eval: user.battler().setMaxFrame(4)

name: Flash

  result = true;
 </command replace>

name: Steal
note:
<Steal>
<setup action>
display action
</setup action>

<target action>
if user.attackMotion() !== 'missile'
move user: targets, front, 20
else
perform start
end
zoom: 120%, 20
camera screen: target, front center, 20
camera focus: target, front center, 20
wait for movement
action animation: target
wait for animation
action effect
</target action>

note:

end
zoom: 120%, 20

camera focus: target, front center, 20

end

motion: user, chant

animation wait 148: user
wait for animation
action animation: friends
wait for animation

name: Big Shot
note:
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>
<target action>
perform start
zoom: 150%, 20
camera screen: user, front center, 20
camera focus: user, front center, 20
motion attack: user
Eval: user.battler(6).setMaxFrame(1)
animation 142: user
animation wait 142: user
wait for animation
flash screen: white, 30
reset zoom
reset camera
wait: 35
animation 143: target
animation wait 143: target
move target: backwards, 70, 15
face target: forward
flash scree: red, white, red, 5, 20
shake screen: 9, 7, 20
wait for movement
action effect
wait: 15
</target action>
<finish action>
immortal: target, false
move user: home
Eval: user.battler(6).setMaxFrame(4)
clear battle log
perform finish
</finish action>

reset camera

Eval: user.battler().setMaxFrame(2)

animation wait 152: target
wait for animation

jump user: 170%, 25
motion thrust: user
Eval: user.battler().setMaxFrame(2)

Eval: user.battler().setMaxFrame(1)
animation 153: user
animation wait 153: user
wait for animation
wait: 15

face user: forward

action effect

wait: 15

Eval: user.battler().setMaxFrame(4)
immortal: target, false
clear battle log
perform finish
</finish action>

name: Shinra Strike
note:
Disable Name
<Timed Attack: default>
Repeat Type: Reverse
<End Timed Attack>
<setup action>
common event: 3
action animation 122: user
wait: 100
</setup action>
<target action>
move user: target, front base, 5
face user: forward
wait for movement
common event: 4

zoom: 110%
hide battle hud
tint screen: 50, -75, -75, 0, 60
common event: 1
tint screen: normal, 60
se: CisHa, 100, 110, 0
motion swing: user
common event: 2
show battle hud
zoom: 100%
animation 6: target
wait for animation
action effect
wait: 40
break action
</target action>
